name: Shields Up
description:
Shields Up adds new mechanics to the classic arcade spaceship genre. Being a research ship just trying to collect some asteroids, it may seem like your unprepared for the enemies you'll make, but you'd be surprised how far you can get with nothing more than a trusty shield.

Upgrade you shields along the way to prepare you for stronger enemies.

Play a short campaign that helps you master the game play and gives you some interesting things to read.

Longing for a more traditional play style? Head into arcade mode to see how many stages you can get through.

Controls can be reference in the pause menu. Can use either the arrow keys(left,right,down) or the keys z,x,c
